name: Wayfarer's Rest
description:
(Also playable on https://zakstephens.com/wayfarers-rest/ without the annoying arrow-keys scrolling issue.)

Instructions:

Pick a username and password and click "Create" to play!
Move with the arrow keys. You can send chat messages (sort of? it's cursed) with the input box in the left hand corner.

Don't look for anything to do lol, there's not much.

Features:
  • Open API!
    • Currently hosted at https://zakstephens.com:3000/ because I couldn't get a reverse proxy working in time
    • The client is the documentation (wait that's not a feature)
  • Open source! (MIT)
    • Back-end (good bit): https://gitlab.com/0xc0c0a/wayfarers-rest-server/
    • Front-end (bad bit): https://gitlab.com/0xc0c0a/wayfarers-rest-reference-client
  • Rubber banding!
  • A cursed chat system that only works for the favoured!
Credit:
  • Tileset: DawnLike - 16x16 Universal Rogue-like tileset v1.81 (DragonDePlatino/DawnBringer)
  • Characters: Tiny Characters Set (Fleurman)

(I hash passwords properly, but I'm sure this thing is susceptible to all kinds of XSS and other attacks; please use a unique password you don't use anywhere else, for your sake and mine. Thanks.)
